name: Grappling Through Space Between Two Blackholes
name_original: Grappling Through Space Between Two Blackholes
description:
You are a robot trapped in yellow space between two black-holes that are constantly flipping you upside down. You have a futile mission, but your programming demands that you survive as long as possible, despite your visual systems already beginning to fail you.

Click to shoot your grapple hook, and click again to retract it once it is launched

The buzzing sound is intentional, and is meant to be used to locate which black-hole you are closer too, and therefore heading towards. Don't ask why the black-holes are constantly emitting orange and blue brick walls.

Credits:

Art-pack made by Kenny

Font-pack from https://managore.itch.io/m3x6
